input_email_body:
Subject: Unexpected Network Disconnection Issue

Dear IT Services Customer Support,

I am writing to bring to your attention a sudden network disconnection issue that we have been experiencing with our enterprise Cisco Router model ISR4331. Recently, we have observed that the router is intermittently disconnecting from the network and displaying blinking indicator lights, which suggests potential performance issues.

Our technical team inspected the device thoroughly but could not identify any visible hardware faults My name is David Kim.. This has caused significant disruption to our operations, and we are keen on resolving it at the earliest.

We kindly request your expert assistance in either dispatching a technician to inspect the router on-site or offering remote diagnostics and support You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. Our company greatly relies on uninterrupted network connectivity, and resolving this issue is of immediate importance to us.

Please let us know the next steps we should take to expedite this process. If you require any additional information for troubleshooting, feel free to contact me at <tel_num>.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,

<name>
Account Number: <acc_num>
